instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Board Identification Suggestions
threads.message: I'm working on a 2015 A1502 and I just received a shipment of donor boards for various macbooks. The A1502 logic board has 2 stickers, neither of which have the apple part number or the part number that sellers have listed. What numbers or letters on the stickers do you use to identify what board you're looking at?

threads.title: Board Identification Suggestions
threads.message: It's not a sticker it is in the solder mask.
